metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3310 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient policy enforcement in custom tabs in Google Chrome on Androidprior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed an attacker who convinced the user toinstall an application to bypass same origin policy via a craftedapplication. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
